title: Implement Deep PRD Validation in Doctor
overview:
Doctor currently lacks deep PRD validation, limiting its ability to catch quality issues in requirements and design documents.

**Motivation:** Quality assurance - ensures PRDs are well-formed, complete, and consistent before implementation begins.

**Signals:** priority: high, urgency: Top priority gap - quality assurance
